 Tet Holiday Promotion for High Class Members of Loyalty Program in 2013 1. Eligibility: Diamond, Gold and Titanium members of Loyalty Program that maintain membership level until the time uses services (applied for Card Holder only) 2. Content: Program 1: Travel during Tet Holiday with Hà Nội Red Tours Co. (01/02 - 31/03/2013) Benefits: discount 10% on Package Tour Price(domestic and international) Conditions: Number of promotion tour: 1 tour/member Applied for Card Holder + 1 close relative who joins the trip with Card Holder Discount: Not over VND 5.000.000/ Diamond + Gold Member + close relative VND 3.000.000/ Titanium + close relative Program 2: holiday at Đại Lải Flamingo Resort (01/02 - 31/03/2013) Benefits: Apply the Promo Rate (VND - VAT included) for 100 rooms at Đại Lải Flamingo Resort: Room Type Room Rate Promo Rate Weekend additional charges (if there is) First 50 rooms 25 Lakeview Rooms 10.672.000 1.500.000 500.000 25 Hilltop Rooms 9.702.000 1.000.000 500.000 From the 51 st to 100 th Lakeview 10.672.000 3.000.000 500.000 Hilltop 9.702.000 2.500.000 500.000 Condition: Number of Promo Room/ member within the promotion time Diamond: 3 rooms. Gold: 2 rooms Titanium: 1 rooms The room rates are applied for 2 adults and 1 children (under 6 years old). Any other additional charges (breakfast, extra bed) must follow partner policies Program 3: Using service at Al Fresco's Brand (20/02 - 28/02/2013) Benefits: Discount 50% on total bill/ time that member uses the service at restaurant of brings back home. Applied for all restaurants of Al Fresco's and Pepperonics Việt Nam.Brand Condition: Number of using: Diamond and Gold: 2 times Titanium: 1 time. The amount of discounting is not over VND 1.000.000/bill. For ex: if the total bill if from VND 2.000.000 onward, member will be discounted VND 1.000.000 If Al Fresco's has other promotions at one time, members can join only the promotion that they have chosen 3. How to get benefits: Members must follow these below steps in order to get benefits Step 1: Members must send SMS by the subscriber number which is used for qualifying membership tier. The syntax LK_AP code_member’s email address and send to 9237 (Notes: "_" stands for a blank space). Associate Partner (AP) Partner Code Hà Nội Red Tours RedTours Đại Lải Flamingo Resort Flamingo Al Fresco's Alfrescos The 9237 system will issue e-code via SMS to member’s subscriber number. Email of member to provide all benefit’s information of AP Email of AP to announce Step 2: After receiving e-code via your mobile phone, member must contact to partners to book services before at least 1 day of the day they plans to use services. Member must provide e-code when making transaction procedure. If not, you cannot get any benefits of the promotion Step 3: Making transaction procedure when using services: present e-code, membership card, ID card and pay service fee as the promotion Step 4: After using services, sign on the bill to confirm that you have used the service Notes: Every e-code is valid for using service one time only (For ex: 1 tour; 1 night stay; 1 time of using service at Alfresco brand) If members want to get benefits as the promotion regulation, they have to send sms to get more e-code 2013 &#24180;&#36814;&#26032;&#26149; &#38271;&#26399;&#36830;&#25509;&#39640;&#32423;&#20250;&#21592; 1. &#35576;&#26465;&#20214;: Hội viên Hạng Kim cương, Hạng Vàng và Hạng Titan của chương trình Kết nối dài lâu hiệu lực đến thời điểm sử dụng dịch vụ (chỉ áp dụng chương trình cho đúng chủ thẻ) &#12469;&#12540;&#12499;&#12473;&#12434;&#20351;&#29992;&#12377;&#12427;&#26399;&#38291; : 1 &#53804;&#50612; / &#54924;&#50896; &#53804;&#50612;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54624; &#54924;&#50896; &#48143; &#52828;&#52377; 1 &#47749; &#54624;&#51064;&#54620;&#46020; : 5.000.000 &#46041; / &#45796;&#51060;&#50500;&#47788;&#46300; &#55092;&#50577;&#54624; &#46412; 100 &#44061; &#49892;&#51032; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#45716;&#45796; . ( &#45800;&#50948; : &#48288;&#53944;&#45224;&#46041; - VAT &#54252;&#54632;&#46104;&#50632;&#45796; ) &#44061;&#49892; &#44592;&#51456; &#44277;&#54252;&#44032;&#44201; &#54812;&#53469;&#44032;&#44201; &#51452;&#47568;&#52628;&#44032;&#48708; ( &#50668;&#48512; ) &#52376; &#51020; 50 &#44061;&#49892; Lakeview 25&#44061;&#49892; 10.672.000 1.500.000 500.000 Hilltop 25 &#44061;&#49892; 9.702.000 1.000.000 500.000 51~ 100 &#44061;&#49892; Lakeview 10.672.000 3.000.000 500.000 Hilltop 9.702.000 2.500.000 500.000 &#51312;&#44148; : &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016; &#44592;&#44036; &#51473;&#50640; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#51012; &#44061;&#49892; &#45796;&#51060;&#50500;&#47788;&#46300; &#54924;&#50896; : 3 &#44061;&#49892; &#44264;&#46300; &#54924;&#50896; : 2 &#44061;&#49892; &#54000;&#53440;&#45700; : 1 &#44061;&#49892; &#48376; &#44032;&#44201;&#51008; &#49457;&#51064; 2 &#47749; &#48143; &#50612;&#47536;&#51060; 1 &#47749;&#50640;&#44172; &#51201;&#50857;&#51060; &#46108;&#45796; . &#52840;&#44396;&#52628;&#44032; , &#50500;&#52840;&#49885;&#49324; &#46321; &#52628;&#44032;&#48708;&#45716; &#52404;&#55092;&#49324;&#51032; &#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972;&#49436; &#51201;&#50857;&#51060; &#46108;&#45796; . &#52628;&#51204; 3: &#50508;&#54532;&#47112;&#49828;&#53076; (Al Fresco's) &#49885;&#45817;&#51012; &#51060;&#50857; &#49884; ( &#51201;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036;: 2013 &#45380; 02 &#50900; 20 &#51068; - 2013 &#45380; 02 &#50900; 28 &#51068; ) &#54812;&#53469; : &#51204;&#44397;&#50640; &#50508;&#54532;&#47112;&#49828;&#53076; &#48143; &#48288;&#53944;&#45224; Pepperonics &#49885;&#45817;&#50640;&#49436; &#49885;&#49324;&#54616;&#44144;&#45208; &#44032;&#51648;&#44256; &#44032;&#49884; &#45716; &#51020;&#49885;&#51012; &#49332; &#52509;&#50529;&#51032; 50% &#54624;&#51064; &#48155;&#45716;&#45796; . &#51312;&#44148; : &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#44163; : &#45796;&#51060;&#50500;&#47788;&#46300; &#48143; &#44264;&#46300; &#54924;&#50896; : 2 &#48264; &#54000;&#53440;&#45700; : 1 &#48264; &#54624;&#51064;&#54620;&#46020;&#45716; &#50689;&#49688;&#51613; &#45817; 1.000.000 &#46041; &#51060;&#49345; &#52488;&#44284;&#54616;&#51648; &#50506;&#45796; . &#50696; : &#50689;&#49688;&#51613;&#51032; &#52509;&#50529;&#51008; 2.000.000 &#46041; &#51060;&#49345;&#51060;&#46972;&#45716; &#44221;&#50864; &#54924;&#50896;&#51008; 1.000.000 &#46041;&#51012; &#54624;&#51064; &#48155;&#45716;&#45796; . &#44536; &#49884;&#44036;&#50640; &#50508;&#54532;&#47112;&#49828;&#53076; &#45716; &#46041;&#49884;&#50640; &#50668;&#47084; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#44032; &#51080;&#45716; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#54924;&#50896;&#51008; &#49440;&#53469;&#45824;&#47196; &#54620; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032;&#47564; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . 3. &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49692;&#49436; : &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#46020;&#47197; &#54924;&#50896;&#45716; &#45796;&#51020;&#44284; &#44057;&#50640; &#49692;&#49436;&#47484; &#49892;&#54665;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . 1 &#52264; : &#54924;&#50896;&#51008; &#54924;&#50896;&#51032; &#51204;&#54868;&#48264;&#54840;&#47196; LK_( &#52404;&#55092;&#49324;&#51032; &#53076;&#46300; )_ &#47700;&#51068; &#51452;&#49548; ( &#50668;&#48512; ) &#47484; &#51089;&#49457;&#54644;&#49436; 9237 &#48264;&#51004;&#47196; &#48372;&#45236;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . &#52404;&#55092;&#49324;&#47749; &#52404;&#55092;&#49324; &#53076;&#46300; Hà Nội Red Tours RedTours Đại Lải Flamingo Resort Flamingo Al Fresco's Alfrescos 9237 &#49884;&#49828;&#53596;&#51008; &#45796;&#51020;&#44284; &#44057;&#51008; &#49688;&#45800;&#51004;&#47196; e-code &#47484; &#46041;&#49884;&#50640; &#48372;&#45244; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . &#54924;&#50896;&#50640;&#44172; &#47928;&#51088;&#47196; &#48372;&#45252; &#44396;&#52404;&#51201;&#51064; &#54812;&#53469;&#45236;&#50669;&#51012; &#54924;&#50896;&#51032; &#47700;&#51068;&#51004;&#47196; &#48372;&#45252; &#53685;&#48372;&#54616;&#46020;&#47197; &#52404;&#55092;&#49324;&#51032; &#47700;&#51068;&#51004;&#47196; &#48372;&#45252; 2 &#52264; : e-code &#47484; &#48155;&#51008; &#54980;&#50640; &#49436;&#48708;&#49828;&#47484; &#49324;&#50857;&#54616;&#46020;&#47197; &#52572;&#49548; &#54616;&#47336; &#51204;&#50640; &#52404;&#55092;&#49324;&#50752; &#50672;&#46973;&#54644;&#49436; &#49436;&#48708;&#49828;&#47484; &#50696;&#50557;&#54620;&#45796; . &#54924;&#50896;&#51008; &#52404;&#55092;&#49324;&#50640;&#44172; e-code &#47484; &#44277;&#44553;&#54644;&#51480;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . &#50500;&#45768;&#47732; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#50630;&#45796; . 3 &#52264; : &#49436;&#48708;&#49828;&#47484; &#49324;&#50857; &#49884; &#45796;&#51020;&#44284; &#44057;&#50640; &#49692;&#49436;&#47484; &#49892;&#54665;&#54644;&#51452;&#49884;&#44592; &#48148;&#46976;&#45796; . E-code &#48143; &#54924;&#50896;&#52852;&#46300; , &#49888;&#48516;&#51613;&#51012; &#48372;&#50668;&#51452;&#49884;&#44256; &#51060;&#50857;&#49436;&#48708;&#49828;&#51032; &#50836;&#44552;&#51012; &#51648;&#48520;&#54644;&#51452;&#49884;&#44592; &#48148;&#46976;&#45796; . 4 &#52264; : &#49436;&#48708;&#49828;&#47484; &#51060;&#50857;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#49436;&#48708;&#49828; &#51060;&#50857;&#44284; &#50689;&#49688;&#51613;&#50640; &#49436;&#47749;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . &#50976;&#51032; : E-code &#47484; &#54620; &#48264;&#47564; &#49324;&#50857;&#54624; &#49104;&#51060;&#45796; . ( &#50696; : &#53804;&#50612; 1 &#48264; , &#51068; &#48149; , &#50508;&#54532;&#47112;&#49828;&#53076; &#49885;&#45817;&#50640;&#49436; &#54620; &#48264; ) &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6050;&#6086;&#6030;&#6042;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6022;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6086; 2013&#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6023;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6017;&#6098;&#6038;&#6047;&#6091;&#6031;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6041;&#6076;&#6042;&#6050;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6082;&#6020; 1. &#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016; &#6032;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6031;&#6098;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;, &#6032;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6040;&#6070;&#6047;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6032;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091; Titan &#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6031;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6041;&#6076;&#6042;&#6050;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6082;&#6020;&#6047;&#6075;&#6038;&#6043;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;(&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6031;&#6082;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6066;&#6098;&#6041;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6040;&#6098;&#6021;&#6070;&#6047;&#6091;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;)&#6100; 2. &#6017;&#6098;&#6043;&#6073;&#6040;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6102; &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 1&#6102; &#6033;&#6081;&#6047;&#6021;&#6042;&#6030;&#6093; &#6035;&#6085;&#6022;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6086; 2013 &#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6075;&#6040;&#6048;&#6090;&#6075;&#6035; CP Hà Nội Red Tours (&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6102; 01/02 - 31/03/2013) Ưu đãi: Giảm 10% giá mua tour trọn gói trong và ngoài nước &#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6102; &#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6075;&#6087; 10% &#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6033;&#6081;&#6025;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;&#6040;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6036;&#6091; tour &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6085;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6033;&#6081;&#6047;&#6100; Điều kiện: &#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6017;&#6017;&#6030;&#6098;&#6028;&#6096;&#6102; Số lượng tour được ưu đãi: 1 tour/HV &#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035; tour &#6026;&#6082;&#6043;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6102; 1 tour/&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016; Áp dụng cho chính Hội viên và 1 người thân đi cùng tour &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6037;&#6098;&#6033;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020; 1 &#6040;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6033;&#6085;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041; tour Mức giảm không quá: &#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6075;&#6087;&#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6048;&#6077;&#6047;&#6102; 5.000.000đ/ HV Kim cương và Vàng + người đi cùng 5.000.000đ/ &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6031;&#6098;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6040;&#6070;&#6047; + &#6040;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6033;&#6085;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041; 3.000.000đ/ HV Titan + người đi cùng. 3.000.000đ/ &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016; Titan + &#6040;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6033;&#6085;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041; &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 2&#6102; &#6024;&#6036;&#6091;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6035;&#6085; Đại Lải Flamingo Resort (&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6102; 01/02 - 31/03/2013) Ưu đãi: Áp dụng mức giá ưu đãi (đơn giá theo VNĐ - đã VAT) cho 100 phòng cho HV khi nghỉ dưỡng tại Đại Lải Flamingo Resort: &#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6102; &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;(&#6040;&#6070;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6018;&#6071;&#6031;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040; VNĐ - &#6026;&#6082;&#6043;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035; VAT) &#6066;&#6098;&#6041; 100 &#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6036;&#6091;&#6066;&#6098;&#6041;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6024;&#6036;&#6091;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6035;&#6085; Đại Lải Flamingo Resort&#6102; &#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6039;&#6081;&#6033;&#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6036;&#6091; &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6041; &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; &#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6038;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;&#6021;&#6075;&#6020;&#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6031;&#6098;&#6041;(&#6036;&#6078;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;) 50 &#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6036;&#6091;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020; 25 phòng Lakeview 10.672.000 1.500.000 500.000 25 phòng Hilltop 9.702.000 1.000.000 500.000 Từ phòng 51 - 100 &#6038;&#6072;&#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6036;&#6091; 50- 100 Lakeview 10.672.000 3.000.000 500.000 Hilltop 9.702.000 2.500.000 500.000 &#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6017;&#6017;&#6030;&#6098;&#6028;&#6096;&#6102; Số lượng phòng nghỉ được ưu đãi/ HV trong thời gian chương trình: &#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6036;&#6091;&#6024;&#6036;&#6091;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;/ &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6102; Kim cương: 3 phòng. &#6031;&#6098;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6102; 3 &#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6036;&#6091; Vàng: 2 phòng &#6040;&#6070;&#6047;&#6102; 2 &#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6036;&#6091; Titan: 1 phòng Titan: 1 &#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6036;&#6091; Giá phòng áp dụng cho 2 người lớn và 1 trẻ em &#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6066;&#6098;&#6041; 2 &#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6034;&#6086;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020; 1 &#6016;&#6076;&#6035;&#6016;&#6098;&#6040;&#6081;&#6020; &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 3&#6102; &#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6035;&#6085;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; Al Fresco's (&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6102; 20/02 - 28/02/2013) Ưu đãi: Giảm 50% trên tổng giá trị hóa đơn/lần sử dụng dịch vụ tại nhà hàng hoặc cho đồ ăn mang về áp dụng trên toàn bộ hệ thống các nhà hàng Al Fresco's và Pepperonics Việt Nam. &#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6102; &#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6075;&#6087; 50% &#6043;&#6078;&#6047;&#6042;&#6075;&#6036;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6044;&#6071;&#6016;&#6096;&#6041;&#6036;&#6096;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;/&#6040;&#6098;&#6026;&#6020;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6035;&#6085;&#6039;&#6084;&#6023;&#6035;&#6072;&#6041;&#6026;&#6098;&#6027;&#6070;&#6035;&#6060;&#6066;&#6098;&#6041;&#6040;&#6098;&#6048;&#6076;&#6036;&#6041;&#6016;&#6033;&#6085;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6043;&#6078;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;&#6050;&#6047;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6039;&#6084;&#6023;&#6035;&#6072;&#6041;&#6026;&#6098;&#6027;&#6070;&#6035; Al Fresco's và Pepperonics &#6044;&#6080;&#6031;&#6030;&#6070;&#6040;&#6100; &#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6017;&#6017;&#6030;&#6098;&#6028;&#6096;&#6102; &#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6026;&#6020;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6102; Kim cương và Vàng: 2 lần &#6031;&#6098;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6040;&#6070;&#6047;&#6102; 2 &#6026;&#6020;&#6100; Titan: 1 lần. Titan: 1 &#6026;&#6020;&#6100; &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6075;&#6087;&#6017;&#6098;&#6038;&#6047;&#6091;&#6036;&#6086;&#6037;&#6075;&#6031;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6048;&#6077;&#6047; 1.000.000đ/&#6044;&#6071;&#6016;&#6096;&#6041;&#6036;&#6096;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;,&#6100; &#6055;, &#6036;&#6078;&#6047;&#6071;&#6035;&#6047;&#6042;&#6075;&#6036;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6043;&#6078;&#6044;&#6071;&#6016;&#6096;&#6041;&#6036;&#6096;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6072; 2&#6043;&#6070;&#6035;&#6049;&#6078;&#6020;&#6033;&#6085;, &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6075;&#6087; 1.000.000đ&#6100; &#6036;&#6078;&#6047;&#6071;&#6035; Al Fresco's &#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6021;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6035;&#6085; 1&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6100; &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6031;&#6082;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043; 1&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6038;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6087;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6023;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6100; 3. &#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6102; &#6026;&#6078;&#6040;&#6098;&#6036;&#6072;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6034;&#6098;&#6044;&#6078;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6023;&#6086;&#6048;&#6070;&#6035;&#6017;&#6070;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6040;&#6102; &#6023;&#6086;&#6048;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6072; 1&#6102; &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6018;&#6074;&#6023;&#6070;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6071;, &#6047;&#6042;&#6047;&#6081;&#6042;​ LK_&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6026;&#6083;&#6018;&#6076;_&#6050;&#6047;&#6041;&#6026;&#6098;&#6027;&#6070;&#6035; email (&#6036;&#6078;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;) &#6037;&#6098;&#6025;&#6078;&#6033;&#6085;&#6016;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091; 9237 (&#6047;&#6086;&#6018;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6102; "_" &#6018;&#6074;&#6023;&#6070;&#6047;&#6025;&#6098;&#6025;&#6026;&#6016;&#6019;&#6098;&#6043;&#6070;)&#6100; Tên đối tác &#6024;&#6098;&#6040;&#6084;&#6087;&#6026;&#6083;&#6018;&#6076; Mã đối tác &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6026;&#6083;&#6016;&#6076; Hà Nội Red Tours RedTours Đại Lải Flamingo Resort Flamingo Al Fresco's Alfrescos Hệ thống 9237 đồng thời sẽ gửi mã dịch vụ (e-code) qua 3 kênh: &#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; 9237 &#6048;&#6098;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6037;&#6098;&#6025;&#6078;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040; (e-code) &#6022;&#6098;&#6043;&#6020;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040; 3 &#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6041;&#6102; Tin nhắn SMS đến số máy di động của Hội viên. &#6037;&#6098;&#6025;&#6078;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;​ SMS &#6033;&#6085;&#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6100; Email của Hội viên để thông báo chi tiết nội dung ưu đãi. Email &#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6026;&#6078;&#6040;&#6098;&#6036;&#6072;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6047;&#6038;&#6092;&#6031;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6043;&#6086;&#6050;&#6071;&#6031;&#6017;&#6098;&#6043;&#6073;&#6040;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6100; Email của đối tác để thông báo. Email &#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6026;&#6083;&#6018;&#6076;&#6026;&#6078;&#6040;&#6098;&#6036;&#6072;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6047;&#6100; &#6023;&#6086;&#6048;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6072; 2&#6102; &#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6041;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035; e-code &#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;&#6026;&#6083;, &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6034;&#6098;&#6044;&#6078;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6033;&#6020;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6026;&#6083;&#6018;&#6076;&#6026;&#6078;&#6040;&#6098;&#6036;&#6072;&#6026;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6031;&#6071;&#6021;&#6036;&#6086;&#6037;&#6075;&#6031;&#6018;&#6074;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035; 1 &#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6026;&#6082;&#6043;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6075;&#6020;&#6032;&#6070;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6100; &#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6037;&#6098;&#6026;&#6043;&#6091; e-code &#6039;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6040;&#6035;&#6085;&#6026;&#6082;&#6043;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6034;&#6098;&#6044;&#6078;&#6016;&#6071;&#6021;&#6098;&#6021;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6026;&#6083;&#6018;&#6076;, &#6036;&#6078;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6037;&#6098;&#6026;&#6091;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6100; &#6023;&#6086;&#6048;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6072; 3&#6102; &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6016;&#6071;&#6021;&#6098;&#6021;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6102; &#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6048;&#6070;&#6025; e-code, &#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6048;&#6070;&#6025;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;, &#6050;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6047;&#6025;&#6098;&#6025;&#6070;&#6030;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6066;&#6098;&#6041;&#6026;&#6083;&#6018;&#6076;&#6100; &#6023;&#6086;&#6048;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6072; 4&#6102; &#6021;&#6075;&#6087;&#6048;&#6031;&#6098;&#6032;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6070;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6071;&#6016;&#6096;&#6041;&#6036;&#6096;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6041;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6100; &#6047;&#6086;&#6018;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6102; e-code &#6035;&#6072;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6031;&#6082;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6066;&#6098;&#6041; 1&#6026;&#6020;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;(&#6055;, 1 tour; 1 &#6041;&#6036;&#6091;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;; 1 &#6026;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6035;&#6085;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; e-code &#6026;&#6076;&#6021;&#6035;&#6084;&#6087;&#6100;
